ing: 1 fluid ounce orange-flavored liqueur (such as CointreauÂ®)
1 fluid ounce raspberry-flavored liqueur (such as ChambordÂ®)
des: "This is a delicious twist to your traditional cosmo. It is sure to be a hit at your next dinner party. Three grapes on a swizzle stick makes a nice garnish."
ins: Pour vodka, orange-flavored liqueur, raspberry-flavored liqueur, acai-pomegranate juice, and lime juice over ice cubes in a cocktail shaker; cover and shake until well-chilled. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with 3 grapes.
